I am fine, I am fine. I'm so glad to have you here as my customer.
I sell much, much indeed. Just read the blackboards for my awesome wares or just ask me.
I am a merchant, just a humble merchant. What can I do for you?
My name is Obi, just Obi, the honest merchant. Do you want to buy something?
I sell stuff to prices that low, that all other merchants would mock at my stupidity.
If you want to challenge the monsters, you need some weapons and armor I sell. You need them definitely!
If you want to explore the dungeons, you have to equip yourself with the vital stuff I am selling. It's vital in the deepest sense of the word.
Oh, our sewer system is very primitive; so primitive it's overrun by rats. But the stuff I sell is safe from them. Do you want to buy some of it?
The king encouraged salesmen to travel here, but only I dared to take the risk, and a risk it was!
He is the head of the local academy. I encouraged him to sponsor you guy, but no one listens to Obi, no one listens to me, as usually.
I don't like him, I dislike him deeply. He is so greedy that he doesn't want to share his profit from life fluids.
What a hero, what a hero.
She is beautiful, very, very beautiful. I hope I can impress her in some way.
This guy does not understand that he should entrust me with the foodbusiness, too. He really should do that and have more time for his farm.
Bugs plague this isle, but my wares are bugfree, totally bugfree.
I sell equipment of all kinds, all kind available on this isle. Just ask me about my wares if you are interested.
One day I will return to the continent as a rich, a very rich man!
My good old cousin Sam. Oh, how I miss him, how I miss him.
Oh, Thais, I'll be back, I'll be back one day.
I sell weapons, shields, armor, helmets, and equipment. For what do you want to ask?
I sell weapons, shields, armor, helmets, and equipment. For what do you want to ask?
I sell spears, rapiers, sabres, daggers, hand axes, axes, and short swords. Just tell me what you want to buy.
I sell jackets, coats, doublets, leather armor, and leather legs. Just tell me what you want to buy.
I sell leather helmets, studded helmets, and chain helmets. Just tell me what you want to buy.
I sell wooden shields and studded shields. Just tell me what you want to buy.
I sell torches, bags, scrolls, shovels, picks, backpacks, sickles, scythes, ropes, fishing rods and sixpacks of worms. Just tell me what you want to buy.
What do you need? I sell weapons, armor, helmets, shields, and equipment.
